explanation: Global Witness is an international NGO that investigates the exploitation of natural resources and its impact on conflict, poverty, corruption, and human rights. They campaign against illegal logging, conflict diamonds, and corruption in the oil, gas, and mining industries. They are funded by grants from foundations, governments, and charities. [https://www.globalwitness.org/en/] [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Global_Witness]

SOCAR is the State Oil Company of the Republic of Azerbaijan. The provided documents indicate that SOCAR is involved in the exploration, production, processing, refining, and sale of oil, gas, and other related products. It owns and operates oil refineries, gas processing plants, and pipeline networks. Therefore, SOCAR is classified as a fossil fuel company. See: [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/SOCAR](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/SOCAR)

Lenovo is a multinational technology company that designs, manufactures, and markets consumer electronics, personal computers, software, servers, and related services. It is not involved in fossil fuels, is not an environmental organisation, a government department, or a university. According to its Wikipedia page, it is a public company in the 'Computer hardware Electronics' industry. [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lenovo](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lenovo)
